allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial landing page for krool.github.io

- Dark/modern theme with AI game dev focus
- 5 projects: Roguecraft, SuperSmashTexty, Typecast, Pokemon Blue Gacha, Steam Screenshot Viewer
- 8-bit audio system with background music and sound effects
- Floating Pokemon sprites and ASCII characters
- ASCII cursor trail effect
- Konami code easter egg
- Responsive design with mobile support
- CRT scanlines effect

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add visual enhancements and interactive effects

- Matrix rain falling code background (canvas)
- Parallax scrolling with stars and grid layers
- Glitch text effect on hero title
- Typing animation for hero subtitle
- 3D card tilt effect on project hover
- Animated gradient background
- Click ripple effects on buttons
- Enhanced scroll animations (slide from sides, blur fade)
- Button glow effects on hover
- Logo hover animation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add retro visual enhancements

- Real project screenshots/GIFs for all project cards
  - Pokemon Blue Gacha: Multiple Pokemon sprites (Pikachu, Charizard, Mewtwo) with masterball
  - Roguecraft: Space shooter icon with starfield
  - SuperSmashTexty: Animated ASCII art terminal box
  - Steam Screenshot Viewer: Steam-styled gradient with shine effect
  - Typecast: YouTube thumbnail integration
- Custom pixelated SVG cursors (pointer and hand)
- Retro loading screen with animated progress bar
- Film grain/noise overlay effect
- Custom K-shaped favicon

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
